data.short_description: If you submit a link which ends in a period and is apart of link such as ``https://fortnitetracker.com/profile/pc/No1ne.`` it will show the correct link in the rich embed but hypertext excludes the period
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1 - Post any link that includes a period at the end   - Step 2 - Click on the highlighted link text which does not include the period in link.
